root.name: Nintendo DS Browser
root.description: Because the Nintendo DS Browser uses the Game Boy Advance slot, Nintendo released two versions. The DS version is compatible with both the DS and the DS Lite, but the GBA slot add-on will stick out of the bottom of the system. The GBA slot add-on in the DS Lite version is smaller and does not stick out of the DS Lite, but for this reason it will not work in the original Nintendo DS.
